name: silverfort-multisession-game
description: A multisession web game with real-time synchronization

scripts.build: npm run shared:build && npm run server:build && npm run client:build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd shared-types && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules client/node_modules server/node_modules shared-types/node_modules client/dist server/dist shared-types/dist
